${ModID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
${ModID}:Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL A random enemy loses !M! HP.}

${ModID}:Abomination.NAME: Abomination
${ModID}:Abomination.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Evo'd{!Upgrades!|>0= and ${ModID}:Mutated} *Marrow{!M!|>1=s}{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=+} into your draw pile.

${ModID}:AcidSpit.NAME: Venomous
${ModID}:AcidSpit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply ${ModID}:Acid, apply !M! more{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= and gain !${ModID}:m2! Block}.

${ModID}:Adaptation.NAME: Mitosis
${ModID}:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Evo your hand.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Gain Block equal to the number of cards ${ModID}:Evo'd.}{!B!|>-1=(!B!)}{!M!|1= NL Discard !M! card at random.|>1= NL Discard !M! cards at random.}

${ModID}:Anger.NAME: Batter
${ModID}:Anger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all ${ModID}:Mutations from a card to{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak and} make the enemy lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Bile.NAME: Corrosive Spit
${ModID}:Bile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=a debuff|@=${ModID}:Acid}, apply !M! ${ModID}:Acid

${ModID}:Bite.NAME: Snake Snap
${ModID}:Bite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Acid{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= and !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable} to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BlackHole.NAME: Instability
${ModID}:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. If you lose HP this turn, lose !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you lose HP this turn, lose #b

${ModID}:BodyHorror.NAME: Body Horror
${ModID}:BodyHorror.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block for each of your ${ModID}:Adaptations.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Your current ${ModID}:Adaptations last !${ModID}:m2! more turn.}
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:BurnVictim.NAME: Burn Victim
${ModID}:BurnVictim.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. Apply !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable to them. NL Shuffle !${ModID}:m3! *Burns into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Burrow.NAME: Burrow
${ModID}:Burrow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, gain !M! temporary Strength{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= and Dexterity}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, gain #b
Whenever you are attacked this turn, gain #b

${ModID}:Changeling.NAME: Changeling
${ModID}:Changeling.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutate !M!{!Upgrades!|0= random} card{!M!|>1=s}.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Reduce {!M!|1=its cost|@=their costs} by !${ModID}:m2! this turn.}

${ModID}:ChemicalWarfare.NAME: Chemical Warfare
${ModID}:ChemicalWarfare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=Potions|@=The next potion} you use this turn is used {!M!|1=once|2=twice|3=thrice|@=!M! times}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The next potion you use this turn is used #b
Potions you use this turn are used #b

${ModID}:Chomp.NAME: Chomp
${ModID}:Chomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each unupgraded{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= or ${ModID}:un-Evo'd} card in your hand.{!M!|1= NL (Hits !M! time.)|>-1= NL (Hits !M! times.)}

${ModID}:Claw.NAME: Gro-Claw
${ModID}:Claw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Increase the damage of ALL ${ModID}:Evo'd Attacks by !M!.}

${ModID}:CosmicHorror.NAME: Cosmic Horror
${ModID}:CosmicHorror.DESCRIPTION: Future ${ModID}:Adaptations last !M! additional turn{!M!|>1=s}.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Whenever an ${ModID}:Adaptation ends, gain{!${ModID}:m2!|repeat= [E]}.}

${ModID}:Devolution.NAME: Devolution
${ModID}:Devolution.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${ModID}:m2! Strength. NL {!${ModID}:m3!|1=Next turn|@=In !${ModID}:m3! turns}, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Deformation.NAME: Deform
${ModID}:Deformation.DESCRIPTION: {!Upgrades!|0=At|@=Now and at} the start of your turn, add 1 *Splice{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=+} into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add #b

${ModID}:Delirium.NAME: Delirium
${ModID}:Delirium.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Randomise their costs.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Gain [E] [E]. NL ${ModID}:Devo.}

${ModID}:EasyPrey.NAME: Easy Prey
${ModID}:EasyPrey.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has less than !M! HP, deal !D! damage. NL Otherwise, deal !${ModID}:d2! damage.

${ModID}:ESP.NAME: ESP
${ModID}:ESP.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Evo'd cards deal !M! additional damage and grant !M! additional Block.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL ${ModID}:Evo your hand.}

${ModID}:EvolvedStrike.NAME: Evolved Strike
${ModID}:EvolvedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL {!Upgrades!|>0=Upgrade and }${ModID}:Evo a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:ExperimentalTreatment.NAME: Experiment
${ModID}:ExperimentalTreatment.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random card{!M!|>1=s} into your hand. NL {!M!|1=It costs|@=They cost} 0 this turn.

${ModID}:ExplosivePustules.NAME: Explosive Pustules
${ModID}:ExplosivePustules.DESCRIPTION: {!Upgrades!|0=At|@=Now and at} the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Adapt !M!: *Pustule.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, #yAdapt #b

${ModID}:Flatten.NAME: Flatten
${ModID}:Flatten.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Upgrade this card.} NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${ModID}:FleshHeap.NAME: Flesh Heap
${ModID}:FleshHeap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enemies cannot create cards {!M!|1=this turn|@=for !M! turns}.

${ModID}:FluidCycle.NAME: Fluid Cycle
${ModID}:FluidCycle.DESCRIPTION: The next {!M!|1=time|@=!M! times} you apply ${ModID}:Acid, gain Block equal to the amount applied.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: time you apply #yAcid, gain #yBlock equal to the amount applied.
times you apply #yAcid, gain #yBlock equal to the amount applied.

${ModID}:GetOut.NAME: Get Out
${ModID}:GetOut.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Your next {!${ModID}:m2!|1=Attack deals|@=!${ModID}:m2! Attacks deal} no damage.

${ModID}:GiganticGrowth.NAME: Gigantic Growth
${ModID}:GiganticGrowth.DESCRIPTION: Mutate !M! random card{!M!|>0=s} in your draw pile.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Add {!${ModID}:m2!} of them into your hand at random.}

${ModID}:HalfRemembered.NAME: Remembrance
${ModID}:HalfRemembered.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an ${ModID}:Evo'd card, ${ModID}:Devo it,{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= gain !${ModID}:m3! Block,} draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} and gain{!${ModID}:m2!|repeat= [E]}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an #yEvo'd card, #yDevo it.
Whenever you play an #yEvo'd card, draw #b
Whenever you play an #yEvo'd card, gain
Whenever you play an #yEvo'd card, gain #b

${ModID}:HarbingerForm.NAME: Harbinger Form
${ModID}:HarbingerForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a ${ModID}:Mutated card, ${ModID}:Mutate it{!Upgrades!|>0= and shuffle it into your draw pile}.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL ${ModID}:Mutate your hand.}
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a #yMutated card, #yMutate it #b
Whenever you play a #yMutated card, shuffle it into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Headhunt.NAME: Headhunt
${ModID}:Headhunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this kills an enemy, deal !${ModID}:d2! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Hostility.NAME: Hostility
${ModID}:Hostility.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage, deal !M! damage {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=to ALL enemies.|@=back}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage, deal #b

${ModID}:Humanity.NAME: Humanity
${ModID}:Humanity.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Shiny *Marrow{!M!|>1=s} into your draw pile.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Add !${ModID}:m2! of them into your hand.}

${ModID}:Isolation.NAME: Alter
${ModID}:Isolation.DESCRIPTION: Gain{!M!|repeat= [E]}.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Draw !${ModID}:m3! cards. NL ${ModID}:Devo.} NL {!${ModID}:m2!|1=Next turn|@=For !${ModID}:m2! turns}, draw 1 less card.

${ModID}:ItFollows.NAME: Spread
${ModID}:ItFollows.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw pile. ${ModID}:Mutate{!${ModID}:EVO!|-1= and ${ModID}:Evo|1= and Upgrade|2=, ${ModID}:Evo, and Upgrade} them.

${ModID}:JacobsLadder.NAME: Jacob's Ladder
${ModID}:JacobsLadder.DESCRIPTION: {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=Gain !${ModID}:b2! Block. NL }Gain !B! Block for each Attack played this turn.{!M!|1= NL (!M! Attack played.)|>-1= NL (!M! Attacks played.)}

${ModID}:LastDitch.NAME: Press On
${ModID}:LastDitch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Your next ${ModID}:Adaptation lasts !M! additional turn{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:ChargedMarrow.NAME: Charged Marrow
${ModID}:ChargedMarrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.{!${ModID}:EVO!| NL Gain !B! Block.} NL Gain{!M!|repeat= [E]}.

${ModID}:ShiningMarrow.NAME: Shiny Marrow
${ModID}:ShiningMarrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.{!${ModID}:EVO!| NL Gain !B! Block.} NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:MeatShield.NAME: Meat Shield
${ModID}:MeatShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Increase this card's block by !M! this combat.}

${ModID}:MetalCrusher.NAME: Metal Crusher
${ModID}:MetalCrusher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Adapt !M!: *Razorspine.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= Increase that ${ModID}:Adaptations's damage by !${ModID}:m2!}

${ModID}:Mimicry.NAME: Mimicry
${ModID}:Mimicry.DESCRIPTION: Choose a random red, green, or blue{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= Upgraded} card to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Mutate.NAME: Embrace Defects
${ModID}:Mutate.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade{!Upgrades!|>0= and ${ModID}:Evo} your current ${ModID}:Adaptations.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL They last !M! additional turn.}

${ModID}:NeowsEmbrace.NAME: Neow's Embrace
${ModID}:NeowsEmbrace.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= and !${ModID}:m2! HP} until after their next attack.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: less damage until after its next Attack.

${ModID}:NoMercy.NAME: No Mercy
${ModID}:NoMercy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your {!M!|1=next turn|@=!M! next turns}, add !${ModID}:m2!{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= ${ModID}:Evo'd} *Marrow{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next #b

${ModID}:OneForAll.NAME: Acidtouch
${ModID}:OneForAll.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage{!M!|1=|2= twice|@= !M! times}. NL Apply ${ModID}:Acid equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:OnTheFly.NAME: Wings
${ModID}:OnTheFly.DESCRIPTION: Take !M!% less damage from Attacks.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL When ${ModID}:Evo'd, gain !${ModID}:m2! Artifact.}

${ModID}:Overpower.NAME: Overpower
${ModID}:Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have more HP than {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=any|@=the} enemy, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Phantasmagoria.NAME: Phantasmagoria
${ModID}:Phantasmagoria.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL The Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.}

${ModID}:PileOn.NAME: Pile On
${ModID}:PileOn.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! ${ModID}:Evo'd *Marrow{!M!>1=s} into your hand.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL They deal !${ModID}:m3! additional damage.} NL Shuffle !${ModID}:m2! *Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Pounce.NAME: Pounce
${ModID}:Pounce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Evo {!M!|1=it|2=1 and discard the other|@=one and discard the others}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Evo 1.

${ModID}:Psionics.NAME: Psionics
${ModID}:Psionics.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Devo {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=this card|@=a card in your hand} to deal !D! damage !M! times.

${ModID}:Pustule.NAME: Pustule
${ModID}:Pustule.DESCRIPTION: {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=Attacks deal !${ModID}:m2! additional damage. NL }${ModID}:Throb: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Radiance.NAME: Radiance
${ModID}:Radiance.DESCRIPTION: Playing *Marrows increases the damage of *Marrows by !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a #yMarrow, increase the damage of #yMarrows by #b

${ModID}:Razorspine.NAME: Razorspine
${ModID}:Razorspine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked,{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= deal !${ModID}:m2! damage back then} deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Robotization.NAME: Cybernetics
${ModID}:Robotization.DESCRIPTION: {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=Lightning deals !${ModID}:m2! additional damage. NL }${ModID}:Throb: Channel !M! Lightning.

${ModID}:SalivaSlick.NAME: Saliva Slick
${ModID}:SalivaSlick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Apply !${ModID}:m3! Vulnerable.} NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Acid.

${ModID}:ShackleDrag.NAME: Shackle Drag
${ModID}:ShackleDrag.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL ALL enemies lose !${ModID}:m3! Strength this turn.} NL Shuffle !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Evo'd *Dark *Shackles into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Spew.NAME: Spew
${ModID}:Spew.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Acid.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL When the enemy loses all ${ModID}:Acid, apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Acid.}

${ModID}:SplayYourGuts.NAME: Splay Guts
${ModID}:SplayYourGuts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Marrow{!M!|>1=s}{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= and discard pile}.

${ModID}:Splice.NAME: Splice
${ModID}:Splice.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity. NL Gain !M! Strength.{!${ModID}:EVO!|1= Add a *Splice into your hand.|2= Add a *Splice+ into your hand.}

${ModID}:Stalker.NAME: Stalk
${ModID}:Stalker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When ${ModID}:Evo'd or ${ModID}:Mutated, increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:StemCells.NAME: Stem Cells
${ModID}:StemCells.DESCRIPTION: {!Upgrades!|0=At|@=Now and at} the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Mutate and ${ModID}:Evo !M! card{!M!|>0=s}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, #yMutate #b
At the start of your turn, #yMutate and #yEvo #b

${ModID}:StrangeScience.NAME: Rewire
${ModID}:StrangeScience.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Orb slot{!M!|>1=s}.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Channel !${ModID}:m3! Frost.} NL ${ModID}:Adapt !M!: *Cybernetics.

${ModID}:SurpriseAttack.NAME: Surprise Attack
${ModID}:SurpriseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage{!${ModID}:m2!|1=|2= twice|@= !${ModID}:m2! times}. NL Put !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your discard pile into your hand and ${ModID}:Mutate {!M!|1=it|@=them},

${ModID}:SurvivalOfTheFittest.NAME: Lick Clean
${ModID}:SurvivalOfTheFittest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy loses HP, gain{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= !${ModID}:m2! Block and gain} Vigor equal to !M!% of HP lost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy loses HP, gain #yVigor equal to #b
Whenever an enemy loses HP, gain #b

${ModID}:SuspiciousCure.NAME: Suspicious Cure
${ModID}:SuspiciousCure.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses HP equal to{!M!|1=|2= double|3= triple|4= quadruple|5= quintuple|6= sextuple|:= !M! times} their ${ModID}:Acid, then loses ALL ${ModID}:Acid.

${ModID}:TendonSlash.NAME: Tendon Slash
${ModID}:TendonSlash.DESCRIPTION: {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=Give the enemy !M! Block. NL }Deal !D! damage until the enemy has no Block. NL Gain !B! Block for each hit.

${ModID}:Tendrils.NAME: Tendrils
${ModID}:Tendrils.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= NL Gain Block equal to !${ModID}:m2!% of damage dealt.} NL Permanently increase this card's damage by !M!.

${ModID}:Thrash.NAME: Thrash
${ModID}:Thrash.DESCRIPTION: {!${ModID}:EVO!|>0=Decrease the counter of your leftmost ${ModID}:Adaptation by !${ModID}:m2!|@=Remove your leftmost ${ModID}:Adaptation} to deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:ToTheLimit.NAME: To The Limit
${ModID}:ToTheLimit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength{!${ModID}:EVO!|>0= and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity}. NL If you lose any HP this turn, die.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you lose HP this turn, die.

${ModID}:ToxicGlands.NAME: Toxic Glands
${ModID}:ToxicGlands.DESCRIPTION: Attacks apply ${ModID}:Acid equal to !M!% of unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:WasteDump.NAME: Waste Dump
${ModID}:WasteDump.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Acid to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply #b

${ModID}:WrithingTentacles.NAME: Writhing Tentacles
${ModID}:WrithingTentacles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Mutate !M! random card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand.
